text.section:
Sec. 8A-8.1. Intent.
Sections—8A-8.4 is intended to prevent the sale to and possession of tobacco products including flavored tobacco products of all types, including, but not limited to, flavored tobacco products that resemble candy, such as pellets, film strips and twisted sticks, by persons under the age of 18 by regulating the placement of such products. Sections—8A-8.4 shall not be interpreted or construed to prohibit the sale or delivery of tobacco products including flavored tobacco products, which are otherwise lawful or regulated pursuant to Chapter 569, Florida Statutes.
